user_query: I'm a travel blogger and I want to share my latest blog post on social media. Can you help me create short URLs for the blog post using the bitly tool? I also need to create branded short links for my website using the URL Link Shortener tool.

TaskList.description: Use the Bitly API to create short URLs for the latest blog post.
Use the URL Link Shortener API to create branded short links for the website.
